User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a learner, I want to securely sign up and log in using email, phone, or social login so that I can access my personalized learning journey.
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin‑style summa: Given a new user When signup is attempted Then identity is verified and account is created securely.
Vibe Prompt (SMART: Design a secure authentication module supporting email OTP, phone OTP, Google and Apple login. Ensure OAuth2 compliance, encrypted credential storage, session expiry handling, and role‑based access. Deliver REST APIs + UI flows. Success = login <2s, zero plain‑text credentials.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As an admin, I want role‑based access (student, teacher, reviewer, admin) so that each user sees only relevant capabilities.
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin‑style summa: Given a role When user logs in Then permissions align with role matrix.
Vibe Prompt (SMART: Implement RBAC with a permission matrix configurable via admin UI. Enforce permissions at API and UI levels. Validate via 100% permission coverage tests.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a learner, I want a rich profile showing progress, preferences, and goals so that my learning is personalized.
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin‑style summa: Given profile data When dashboard loads Then progress and preferences render correctly.
Vibe Prompt (SMART: Create a learner profile service capturing goals, preferred language, pace, streaks, and mastery level. Persist data and expose via APIs. Accuracy ≥99%.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a student, I want lessons broken into 5 micro‑lessons so that I can learn in short focused sessions.
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin‑style summa: Given a lesson When accessed Then exactly 5 micro‑lessons are available.
Vibe Prompt (SMART: Build a lesson schema enforcing exactly 5 micro‑lessons, each with concept, example, practice, feedback, and recap. Validate schema at creation time.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a learner, I want text, audio (TTS), and interactive content so that different learning styles are supported.
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin‑style summa: Given a lesson When played Then text and audio are synchronized.
Vibe Prompt (SMART: Integrate high‑quality TTS with sentence‑level sync, pause/resume, and speed control. Ensure <300ms audio latency.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a learner, I want lessons available in multiple Indian and global languages so that I can learn comfortably.
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin‑style summa: Given language selection When lesson loads Then correct translation and audio are used.
Vibe Prompt (SMART: Implement language abstraction layer supporting Telugu, Hindi, English initially, extendable to 20+ languages. Use locale‑aware TTS and content mapping.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a student, I want my answers validated step‑by‑step so that I understand mistakes clearly.
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin‑style summa: Given an answer When submitted Then correctness and explanation are shown.
Vibe Prompt (SMART: Build an answer‑validation engine that checks correctness, shows correct answer, and renders step‑by‑step reasoning. Accuracy ≥99%.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a learner, I want quizzes after lessons so that I can assess my understanding.
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin‑style summa: Given quiz submission When evaluated Then score and feedback are shown.
Vibe Prompt (SMART: Create quiz service supporting MCQ, fill‑in‑the‑blank, and reasoning questions. Auto‑grade and store analytics.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a learner, I want AI‑driven recommendations so that my weak areas are strengthened.
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin‑style summa: Given performance data When analyzed Then next lessons are recommended.
Vibe Prompt (SMART: Design an AI recommendation engine using mastery scores, pace, and error patterns to generate adaptive learning paths. Measure improvement ≥20%.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a content creator, I want structured Vibe prompts so that AI generates consistent world‑class lessons.
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin‑style summa: Given a prompt When executed Then output matches schema and quality standards.
Vibe Prompt (SMART: Create a Vibe Prompt framework enforcing SMART rules, schema validation, tone, length, and learning outcomes. Reject non‑compliant outputs.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a curriculum designer, I want AI‑generated lessons aligned to syllabus so that content creation scales.
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin‑style summa: Given syllabus input When generated Then lessons align exactly to objectives.
Vibe Prompt (SMART: Build AI pipelines that generate lessons strictly aligned to CBSE / Olympiad objectives. Include plagiarism checks.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As an educator, I want curriculum from Class 1–12 so that learning is continuous and structured.
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin‑style summa: Given class selection When browsing Then correct curriculum appears.
Vibe Prompt (SMART: Model curriculum hierarchy Class → Subject → Domain → Lesson → Micro‑lesson. Enforce progression rules.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a student, I want Olympiad and competitive prep integrated so that I gain advanced mastery.
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin‑style summa: Given advanced mode When enabled Then higher‑order problems appear.
Vibe Prompt (SMART: Tag lessons with difficulty tiers and enable Olympiad‑grade problem generation using AI.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a learner, I want dashboards showing mastery and streaks so that I stay motivated.
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin‑style summa: Given activity When dashboard loads Then metrics are accurate.
Vibe Prompt (SMART: Implement analytics dashboards with mastery %, streaks, time‑on‑task, and confidence index.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a teacher, I want class‑level analytics so that I can intervene early.
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin‑style summa: Given class data When viewed Then weak areas are highlighted.
Vibe Prompt (SMART: Create teacher analytics views with cohort comparison and AI‑suggested interventions.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a student, I want badges and streaks so that learning feels rewarding.
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin‑style summa: Given milestones When achieved Then badges are awarded.
Vibe Prompt (SMART: Implement gamification engine with streaks, badges, levels, and leaderboards.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a learner, I want offline lesson access so that I can learn without internet.
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin‑style summa: Given offline mode When enabled Then cached lessons play.
Vibe Prompt (SMART: Enable secure offline caching with expiry and sync‑back on reconnect.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a parent, I want visibility into my child’s progress so that I can guide them.
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin‑style summa: Given parent login When viewing dashboard Then child progress is visible.
Vibe Prompt (SMART: Build parent dashboards with read‑only analytics and alerts.

User Story (As a / I want / So that): As a user, I want my data protected so that my privacy is respected.
Acceptance Criteria (Gherkin‑style summa: Given data storage When audited Then compliance is met.
Vibe Prompt (SMART: Ensure GDPR‑like compliance, encrypted data at rest/in transit, audit logs, and consent management.
